content:
Welcome to the Europe stream.
This stream has been created to facilitate the collaboration among European affiliates / EU FHIR communities, exchange practices and share issues.
In this initial phase I would expect it will be used for exchanging ideas on how to realize this
I hope however it could be also used soon to share experiences about the European Projects, and in perspective to work on common (EU) artifacts.
..obviously it is not limited to the FHIR-related discussions..
